footer.hook: Ready to be part of a word changing experience ! Be the change ! Join Us.

globalGolas.title: Sustainable Developments Goals
globalGolas.discription: Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) are a global call to action to end poverty, protect the planet, and ensure prosperity for all. They address various challenges such as inequality, climate change, and environmental degradation.

slogan.title: Become the change you wish to see in the world
slogan.discription: Embrace your vision for a better world, lead by example, inspire positive actions, and together, we can create a brighter future.

HeroSection.title: Join Us in Creating Impactful Change
HeroSection.introduction: Welcome to Pebbels, where we unite hearts and hands to make a difference. Our charity events are more than gatherings; they're opportunities to transform lives. Join our mission to inspire hope, foster change, and spread kindness. Together, we can create a brighter future, one event at a time

Sign up and create your account to join: Sign up and create your account to join our community.
Participate in inspiring events and make: Participate in inspiring events and make a difference in the community.
Host your own charity event and bring po: Host your own charity event and bring positive change to the world.
